Description: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Grants you a 40' radius aura which increases your Henchmen's damage resistance by 10%, boosts regeneration moderately and reduces endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%.  This enhancement can only be slotted in a Mastermind pet power.
DisplayName: Superior Attuned Superior Mark of Supremacy F

Powers.DisplayName: Superior Mark of Supremacy: Endurance/Pet +Resist(All) and +Regen Aura (Mastermind)
Powers.DescShort: Reduces Endurance Cost and Pet +AoE Resist(All), +Regeneration
Powers.DescLong: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Grants you a 40' radius aura which increases your Henchmen's damage resistance by 10%, boosts regeneration moderately and reduces endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%.  This enhancement can only be slotted in a Mastermind pet power.
